text:
GoGuardian - Safer Students. Better Learning.

Los Angeles | Full Time | Remote option but onsite preferable

We are hiring multiple positions and have a strong priority on Senior Full-Stack Engineers with expertise in React.js. Our technology helps schools better control how technology is used by students, which creates safer environments and leads to better learning. If you want to be part of improving education through technology, then talk to us.

https://www.goguardian.com/careers.html

Feel free to email me with questions winston-goguardian-com
